meanings.definition: A brief online post or message typically containing text, images, or links.
meanings.sent1: I read a funny microblog about cats today.
meanings.sent2: She shared a cute microblog of her puppy on social media.
meanings.sent3: The microblog about the dancing hamster made me laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her microblog was a window into her daily life.
meanings.sent5: The microblog was filled with interesting facts and stories.

meanings.definition: To post short updates or messages on a microblogging platform.
meanings.sent1: He likes to microblog about his travels around the world.
meanings.sent2: She will microblog about the event as soon as it starts.
meanings.sent3: I will microblog my lunch plans for fun.
meanings.sent4: They microblogged their way through the conference.
meanings.sent5: Microblogging allows people to share their thoughts instantly.
